text: yadi tum krtaghn bano, to allaah nisprh hai tumase aur vah prasann nahin hota apane bhakton kee krtaghnata se aur yadi krtagyata karo, to vah prasann ho jaayega tumase aur nahin bojh uthaayega koee uthaane vaala doosaron ka bojh. phir tumhaare paalanahaar hee kee or tumhaara phirana hai. to vah tumhen soochit kar dega tumhaare karmon se. vaastav mein, vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai dilon ke bhedon ko
